EnableSeedbags.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for seedbags

EnableSaplings.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for saplings

SeasonalSeedbags.Description: Seasonal seedbags are colour coded to their planting season

NonseasonalColour.AllowValues: Normal, Vanilla, Grandpa, White, WAG, Bog
NonseasonalColour.Description: Colour for non seasonal seedbags (This will only appear in-game if 'Non Seasonal' is selected for 'Seasonal Seedbags')

SeasonalColour.Description: Colours for seasonal seedbags (This will only appear in-game if 'Seasonal' is selected for 'Seasonal Seedbags')

SeasonalForageBags.Description: Seasonal seedbags for foraged seeds (Ancient Fiber, Monster Fruit, Salal Berry, Slime Berry and Void Root)

NonseasonalForageColour.AllowValues: Normal, Vanilla, Grandpa, White, WAG, Bog
NonseasonalForageColour.Description: Colour for non seasonal foraged seedbags (This will only appear in-game if 'Non Seasonal' is selected for 'Seasonal Foraged Seedbags')

SeasonalForageColour.Description: Colours for seasonal foraged seedbags (This will only appear in-game if 'Seasonal' is selected for 'Seasonal Foraged Seedbags')

EnableAncientFiber.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Ancient Ferns seedbags (Ancient Fiber Seeds)

AncientFiberTexture.Description: Choose the texture of seedbag, digspot sack or seedbag

EnableButternutSquash.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Butternut Squash seedbags

EnableCucumber.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Cucumber seedbags

EnableGoldCarrot.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Gold Carrot seedbags

GoldCarrotSparkle.Description: Choose the texture of seedbag, include sparkles or a plain seedbag

SeasonalGoldCarrot.Description: Seasonal seedbags for Gold Carrot seeds

NonseasonalGoldCarrotColour.AllowValues: Normal, Vanilla, Grandpa, White, WAG, Bog
NonseasonalGoldCarrotColour.Description: Colour for non seasonal Gold Carrot seedbags (This will only appear in-game if 'Non Seasonal' is selected for 'Seasonal Gold Carrot Seedbags')

SeasonalGoldCarrotColour.Description: Colours for seasonal Gold Carrot seedbags (This will only appear in-game if 'Seasonal' is selected for 'Seasonal Gold Carrot Seedbags')

EnableJojaBerry.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Joja Berry seedbags

JojaBerryTexture.Description: Choose the texture of seedbag, trellis seedsack or trellis seedbag

EnableJojaVeggie.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Joja Veggie seedbags

JojaVeggieTexture.Description: Choose the texture of seedbag, trellis seedsack or trellis seedbag

SeasonalJojaSeedbags.Description: Seasonal seedbags for Joja seeds (Joja Berry and Joja Veggie)

NonseasonalJojaColour.AllowValues: Normal, Vanilla, Grandpa, White, WAG, Bog
NonseasonalJojaColour.Description: Colour for non seasonal Joja seedbags (This will only appear in-game if 'Non Seasonal' is selected for 'Seasonal Joja Seedbags')

SeasonalJojaColour.Description: Colours for seasonal Joja seedbags (This will only appear in-game if 'Seasonal' is selected for 'Seasonal Joja Seedbags')

EnableMonsterFruit.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Stalk Seedbags

MonsterFruitTexture.Description: Choose the texture of seedbag, digspot sack or seedbag

EnableMonsterMushroom.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Fungus seedbags

MonsterMushroomTexture.Description: Choose the texture of seedbag, digspot sack or seedbag

EnableSalalBerry.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Shrub seedbags

SalalBerryTexture.Description: Choose the texture of seedbag, digspot sack or seedbag

EnableSlimeBerry.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Slime seedbags

SlimeBerryTexture.Description: Choose the texture of seedbag, digspot sack or seedbag

EnableSweetPotato.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Sweet Potato seedbags

EnableVoidRoot.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Void seedbags

VoidRootTexture.Description: Choose the texture of seedbag, digspot sack or seedbag

SeasonalSaplings.Description: Enable saplings to be colour coded to its harvest season

SeasonalSaplingLeaves.Description: Enable the saplings leaves to change with the seasons

SaplingTexture.Description: Texture for saplings, between Pot, Sack with Ribbon or Sack (Sacks are similar to Base Game saplings)

NonseasonalSaplingColour.AllowValues: Normal, Vanilla, Grandpa, White, WAG, Bog
NonseasonalSaplingColour.Description: Colour for non seasonal saplings (This will only appear in-game if 'Non Seasonal' is selected for 'Seasonal Saplings')

SeasonalSaplingColour.Description: Colours for seasonal saplings (This will only appear in-game if 'Seasonal' is selected for 'Seasonal Saplings')

EnableNectarine.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Nectarine tree saplings

EnablePear.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Pear tree saplings

EnablePersimmon.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Persimmon tree saplings

EnableTreeCoin.Description: Enable Seeds N' Saplings textures for Tree Coin

MoneyTreeSapling.Description: Change the Tree Coin into a Money Tree sapling to match other trees
